text: Aerial view of the airport Almería Airport () is located east of Almería city centre, in the province of Almería in south-eastern Spain. It is close to the main tourist centers of the province such as the Cabo de Gata-Níjar Natural Park, El Ejido, Mojácar, Roquetas de Mar or Vera. ==Facilities== It is a modern airport, with arrivals and departures taking place on the main ground floor.
